description.p: Recipes is an easy-to-use application that will help you to discover what to cook today, tomorrow, the rest of the week and for your special occasions.
Recept är ett lättanvänt program som hjälper dig med vad du ska laga för mat idag, imorgon, resten av veckan och andra speciella tillfällen.
O Receitas é um aplicativo fácil de ser usado que irá lhe ajudar a descobrir o que cozinhar hoje, amanhã, pelo resto da semana e para as suas ocasiões especiais.
Przepisy to łatwy w obsłudze program pomagający odkrywać przepisy na dzisiaj, jutro i resztę tygodnia, a także na specjalne okazje.
Recipes er en applikasjon som er enkel å bruke. Den vil hjelpe deg å oppdage hva slags mat du skal lage i dag, i morgen og resten av uka. Til spesielle anledninger og høytider.
요리는 오늘, 내일 다음주, 특별한 날에 무슨 요리를 할 지 찾아보는데 도움을 주는 쓰기 쉬운 프로그램입니다.
Resep adalah aplikasi yang mudah digunakan, yang akan membantu Anda untuk menemukan apa yang akan dimasak hari ini, besok, sisa minggu dan untuk acara khusus Anda.
A Receptek egy könnyedén használható alkalmazás, amely a segítségére lesz annak kitalálásában, hogy mit főzzön ma, holnap, a hét többi napján és különleges alkalmakkor.
Recepti su jednostavna aplikacija za korištenje koja će vam pomoći da otkrijete što ćete kuhati danas, sutra, ostatak tjedna ili u vašim posebnim prigodama.
Recettes est une application facile à utiliser qui vous aidera à trouver ce que vous pouvez cuisiner aujourd’hui, demain, le reste de la semaine et pour vos occasions spéciales.
Reseptit on helppokäyttöinen sovellus, jonka avulla löydät kokkausideoita kuluvalle päivälle, huomiselle ja loppuviikolle sekä erikoistilaisuuksiin.
Recetas de GNOME es una aplicación sencilla de usar que le ayudará a descubrir qué cocinar hoy, mañana, el resto de la semana y en ocasiones especiales.
Recipes is an easy-to-use application that will help you to discover what to cook today, tomorrow, the rest of the week and for your special occasions.
Rezepte ist eine einfache Anwendung, die dabei hilft zu entdecken, was wir heute, morgen, den Rest der Woche und zu besonderen Anlässen kochen können.
Recepty jsou snadno použitelnou aplikací, která vám pomůže vybrat, co si uvařit dnes, zítra, po zbytek týdne a při zvláštních příležitostech.
El Receptes és una aplicació fàcil d'utilitzar que us ajudarà a descobrir què cuinar avui, demà, la resta de la setmana o en les seves ocasions especials.
Recipes comes with a collection of recipes that have been collected by GNOME contributors from all over the world. It also lets you store your own recipes and share them with your friends.
Recept kommer med en samling recept som har samlats ihop av GNOME-volontärer från hela världen. Det låter dig också lagra dina egna recept och dela dem med vänner.

O aplicativo Receitas vem com uma coleção de receitas que foram coletadas por contribuidores do GNOME de todo o mundo. Ele também permite que você armazene suas próprias receitas e as compartilhe com seus amigos.
Program zawiera kolekcję przepisów zebranych przez współtwórców GNOME z całego świata. Umożliwia także dodawanie własnych przepisów i wysyłanie ich znajomym.
Recipes leveres med en samling oppskrifter som har blitt samlet av GNOME-bidragsytere fra hele verden. Det er også mulig å legge inn egne oppskrifter og dele dem med vennene dine.
요리는 전세계 여러 그놈 기여자가 모아둔 조리법을 모아두었습니다. 여러분의 조리법을 저장할 수 있고, 이 조리법을 친구와 공유할 수 있습니다.
Resep hadir dengan koleksi resep yang telah dikumpulkan oleh kontributor GNOME dari seluruh dunia. Hal ini juga memungkinkan Anda menyimpan resep Anda sendiri, dan membaginya dengan teman-teman Anda.

A Receptek egy olyan receptgyűjteménnyel érkezik, amelyet a GNOME közreműködők gyűjtöttek össze a világ minden tájáról. Lehetővé teszi a saját receptjei tárolását is, és megoszthatja azokat az ismerőseivel.
Recepti dolaze sa kolekcijom recepata koje su prikupili GNOME doprinositelji iz cijeloga svijeta. Isto tako vam dopušta da pohranite svoje vlastite recepte i dijelite ih sa svojim prijateljima.

Recettes est fourni avec une collection de recettes qui ont été collectionnées par des contributeurs GNOME de toute la planète. Il vous permet également de stocker vos recettes et de les partager avec vos amis.
Reseptit sisältää kokoelman Gnome-avustajien ympäri maailmaa keräämiä reseptejä. Sen avulla voit myös luoda omia reseptejä ja jakaa niitä ystävien kesken.
Incluye una colección de recetas de colaboradores de GNOME de todo el mundo. También le permite guardar sus propias recetas y compartirlas con sus amigos.
Recipes comes with a collection of recipes that have been collected by GNOME contributors from all over the world. It also lets you store your own recipes and share them with your friends.

Rezepte kommt mit einer Sammlung von Rezepten, die von GNOME Benutzern und Entwicklern aus der ganzen Welt zusammengestellt worden ist. Es lässt Sie auch Ihre eigenen Rezepte eintragen und mit Ihren Freuden teilen.
Recepty přicházejí se sbírkou receptů, které sesbírali přispěvatelé GNOME z celého světa. Můžete si do nich ukládat i vlastní recepty a sdílet je s přáteli.

ul.li: Fix a few crasher bugs
Fix an issue where the chef dialog wouldn't reopen when closed using Esc key
Fix the Flatpak build and the CI build
Fix the build dependencies known to meson (make gio-unix-2.0 explicit)
Update the AppStream data (add OARS data, fix the SPDX license identifier, etc.)
Update the bug reporting URL to GNOME GitLab
Add a label for Halal recipes
Fix the labels on "White fish for people who don't like fish" so it doesn't claim to be vegetarian
Tweak the wording on two recipes in the Vegetarian category, now called "Gravy" and "Marinade"
New and updated translations: Basque, Norwegian, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, English (United Kingdom), French, Friulian, German, Hungarian, Indonesian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, Swedish

description.p: This release fixes a serious bug in version 2.0.0, which could cause all ingredients to lose their amounts when editing a recipe.
We also fixed an issue where ingredients without amount would always get displayed with an errant '1' as amount.

ul.li: Allow recipes to have long names
New recipes: Tzatziki, Soy Chicken, Rice Maize Apple Cake
New and updated translations: Czech, German

description.p: This release adds new features.

Unit conversion support has landed. There are new settings, volume-unit and weight-unit, which can be set to 'locale' (the default), 'metric' or 'imperial' to control how units are displayed. We are also formatting numbers in a human-friendly way and separate them into multiple units where appropriate. This work was done by Outreachy intern Paxana Amanda Xander.
Support for sharing shopping lists to the Todoist mobile app has landed. This work was done by Summer of Code intern Ekta Nandwani.

ul.li: New recipes: Colita con Chimichurri, Fårikål, Marinade, Chicken gravy, Rouladen, Okonomiyaki, various juices, Boef Bourguignon, Grilled salad, Midsummer nights dream, Sous vide, Struwen
The list of ingredients has been revised and expanded
New and updated translations: Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Finnish, German, Indonesian, Polish, Spanish

description.p: A quick follow-up release to fix some issues.

ul.li: Avoid a crash when editing ingredients
Use better glyphs as markers in instructions

description.p: This release adds new features.

ul.li: Improved formatting of numbers as mixed fractions
Recipes can specify a more general yield, instead of just servings, and the amount can be fractional
Lists can be sorted either by name or by recency
The My Recipes list indicates which recipes have been contributed
Recipes can be imported in the Gourmet XML file format
New recipes: Beef Pho, Hawaiian Fish salad, Arroz amarillo, Homemade Mayonnaise and Pad Priew Wan Goong
New and updated translations: Czech, German, Polish

description.p: This release contains a number of bug fixes and minor improvements.

ul.li: Drag-and-Drop of ingredients is improved
Completion for units is improved
Display of temperature units avoids font fallback
Miscellaneous improvements to editing recipes
Formatting of printed recipes is nicer
New recipe: Henry's original stew
Miscellaneous build fixes (OpenBSD, OS X)
Several crash fixes
New and updated translations: Polish, Spanish

description.p: This release completes the new editing experience for ingredients.

ul.li: Error handling on the edit page has been improved
A commandline option has been added for starting with a category view
Temperatures are now displayed according to the locale
Ingredients rows can now be reordered with the keyboard
Fix crashes during import and when showing cuisines
Make exporting work with recent GTK+ versions
Add mm, cm and m to the list of known units
Minor fixes on the shopping list and with printing
New and updated translations: German, Indonesian, Polish, Slovenian, Spanish

description.p: This release adds new features.

ul.li: Editing of ingredients has been improved
Editing of instructions has been improved
Your own ingredients are added to the completions
Recipes are exported as pdf in addition to the archive format
Cuisine descriptions are shown on the pages for individual cuisines
A setting for the preferred temperature unit as been introduced
New recipes: Pesce alla sale
Crash and other bug fixes
New and updated translations: Catalan, Slovak, Spanish

description.p: This release adds new features and translations. It also includes documentation.

ul.li: Add an expander for cuisines on the cuisines page
Show all cuisines in the edit page
Allow reordering ingredients lists
New recipes: Lemon cake, Quinoa salad, Neapolitan pizza, Crispy olives
Download images and recipes from the net
Crash and other bug fixes
New and updated translations: Brazilian Portuguese, British English, Catalan, Czech, German, Hungarian, Indonesian, Korean, Norwegian bokmål, Polish, Serbian, Swedish

description.p: This is the first stable release of Recipes, so everything is new!
Recipes is an easy-to-use application that will help you to discover what to cook today, tomorrow, the rest of the week and for your special occasions.
Recipes comes with a collection of recipes that have been collected by GNOME contributors from all over the world. It also lets you store your own recipes and share them with your friends.
The major features of Recipes include:

ul.li: Add and edit your own recipes
Share recipes with your friends
Export and print shopping lists
Adjust quantities based on the number of servings
Mark recipes to cook later or add them to your favorites
Add notes to recipes
Hands-free cooking instruction mode

description.p: This release focuses on tying up any loose ends before the 1.0 release.
Due to a change in the way we store shopping lists and favorites, you will have to recreate your existing favorites and shopping list after the update.

ul.li: Add a way to go from shopping to cooking
Confirm quitting with unsaved changes
Confirm ending cooking mode with running timers
Store ancillary data in GSettings
Match Chef names when searching
Add --verbose and --version commandline options
Make dialogs non-maximizable on OS X
Use a more traditional menubar on OS X
Bug and memory leak fixes
New recipes: Goulash
Translation updates: Brazilian Portuguese, Finnish, Friulian, German, Polish, Swedish

description.p: A minor update with OS X improvements and a new 'Export All' function.

ul.li: Save exported recipes to a file if sending mail fails
Export all recipes to a file, from the app menu
Dialogs now follow platform conventions for header bars
Adapt to dark theme in some places
Miscellaneous improvements on OS X
New recipes: Nasi Lemak, Sambal Ikan Bilis, Bratkartoffeln
Translation updates: Brazilian Portuguese, Finnish, Friulian, Polish, Spanish

description.p: A minor update, focusing on polish and performance.

ul.li: Improve the UI for search by spiciness
Speed up listing of recipes
Add a “What's New” dialog
New contributed recipes: Hazelnut milk, Hazelnut butter
Translation updates: German, Polish, Serbian, Spanish

description.p: This release brings mainly polish and robustness and crash fixes.

ul.li: Introduce meson build support
Be more robust with incomplete data
Stylistic fixes to cooking mode
Improve the behavior of timers in cooking mode
Add categories for all recipes and new recipes
Show more details for recipes
More contributed recipes

description.p: A quick follow-up release to fix some issues with 0.14.0.

ul.li: Fix problems with string extraction for translation
Mark some forgotten strings as translatable
Make notes in recipes translatable
Add a missing file, cuisine.css.in
Some stylistic improvements to contributed recipes
Several minor bug fixes
More contributed recipes

description.p: This release changes the name of the binary and filesystem locations from 'recipes' to 'gnome-recipes'.
We are now using the email portal to send email, falling back to using a mailto: url if the portal is not available.

ul.li: The fullscreen cooking mode has been refined
Timers play a sound when they expire
Edit and recontribute your contributed recipes
Several bugs and crashes have been fixed
More contributed recipes

description.p: Another release focused on completing the feature set for the 3.24 release.

ul.li: Recipes can be shared by email
GNOME recipes has a mailing list, recipes-list@gnome.org
The shopping list view has been refined
Shopping lists can be shared by email as well

description.p: This release focuses on completing the feature set for the 3.24 release.

ul.li: A new fullscreen cooking mode has been added
Images can be viewed in fullscreen
The user interface for adding notes has been refined
Recipes can be searched for by their spiciness
More contributed recipes

description.p: This release focuses on completing and polishing existing features.

ul.li: Multiple recipes can be exported an imported in one batch
Deletion of recipes can be undone
We inhibit screen blanking and suspend while a recipe is cooked
There is a printable shopping list
The ingredients page has been dropped for now
Problems with exporting in a flatpak sandbox have been resolved

description.p: This release focuses on localization. All included content should be properly translatable now, including recipe and chef descriptions and ingredients.
Other improvements include:

ul.li: Recipe instructions can link to other recipes
Recipe instructions can include links that switch to a particular image
All recipe lists are now populated incrementally
Recipe tiles look nicer now
We show a 'built with GNOME Builder' logo in the About dialog
The About dialog gained a 'System' tab

description.p: This is a minor update that makes it possible to build without some of the dependencies, which helps for building on other platforms, such as OS X.
The performance of loading recipe lists has been improved.
This release focuses on improving recipe editing, and also includes a new feature, multiple ingredients lists per recipe. In detail:

ul.li: Support multiple ingredients lists per recipe
Use 2 column layout for the edit page
Use the new image viewer for editing as well
Editing ingredients lists is much better
Only allow editing your own recipes
Move notes to the details page
Allow markup (links) in chef descriptions
Add spell checking in many places

description.p: This release also adds and updates translations for several languages.
This is another early release, to address problems people found with the 0.2.0 flatpak, and with the export function. A number of general improvements found their way into this release as well:

ul.li: Handle conflicts during recipe import
Use Account portal (if available) to prepopulate user data
Add a GNOME shell search provider
Add several contributed recipes. Thanks, Ray and Bastian!
Fix problems with the dark theme
Add information about chefs to the page listing their recipes
Add information about dietary restricitons to the page listing their recipes
Improve the ingredient parser to recognize more units
Redesign the recipe details page
Fix several crashes
